name: Moustache vs Dumfaces
description:
GAME MADE FOR THE LUDUM DARE 35.

You sir, you are the most bravest man in the universe thanks to your awesome moustache. But that dumbfaces are trying to cut it with his real and sharp dumbtongues, avoid them and DESTROY them with your moustache and other powerful costumes. How long can you stand up feeling your moustache below your nose?

*****________M__O__U__S__T__A__C__H__E__S________*****

HOW TO PLAY:

- Mouse1 = Fire Normal Weapon

- Mouse2 = Fire Special Weapon

- Space = Jump

- Left Shift = Slow motion

- R = Restart Level

- ESC = Quit

*****____________D__U__M__F__A__C__E__S________*****

Hello there, this is my second entry in a Ludum Dare, I was working alone during this 72h, I made the programming, the art and some sound effects. It has some bugs but I think I have done some nice work with my limited time and skills.Hope you enjoy playing

FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER: @SERGIOMRD
